body: damn son look at that tag skills

The thing is, I'm pretty sure there've never been any moderators for this site, as that was one of the founding principles behind its creation. If anything, it's amazing that it's taken as long as it has for trolls to start derailing the overall quality of the site's content. :/
great the only two tags are rape and snuff, sounds like quality content for well adjusted human beings
why do we let fuckwits upload anything like this?  no proper tagging, naming, incomplete AND duplicate?  You're not even trying.
This is both incomplete (missing the final 5 pages) AND is literally already uploaded here in its entirety: https://nhentai.net/g/167450/

Seriously, we're just going with artist and/or circle names for the galleries now? Also, the Japanese tag apparently takes priority in regards to determining which flag is displayed beneath the thumbnail, so if you aren't going to bother with keeping that tag off of the upload, there's not much point applying the english tag to it at all, since outside of proper searches, or checking the gallery regardless of language preference, it would go completely unnoticed. Is it really that much to ask for, that uploaded galleries be tagged properly?
Wow that got dark real fucking quick XD
